documents.document: The only happy person I can think of right now is Mitt Romney. He avoided a crash of cataclysmic proportions.
Disclaimer: I am not a spokesman for Mexican government. I am member of the opposition. Still, my source is high-up and rock-solid.

Under Trump's metrics of only believing wealthy people, Obama should've only listened to Penny Pritzker and John Kerry.
Imagine if you only believe those around you who don't have to worry about their financial well being if you fire them tomorrow.
For Trump to think that only wealthy people can be confident enough to give unvarnished advice only shows how close a bubble he lives in.
I can't stop thinking of that Lewandowski quote that Trump respects Bannon because he's independently wealthy. Where does that leave rest?
